alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 4:50PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wyandotte, northeastern Johnson and west central Jackson Counties through 515 PM CST... At 450 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Olathe, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Shawnee, Lenexa, Leawood, Prairie Village, Merriam, Mission, Edwardsville, Fairway, Mission Hills, Westwood, Lake Quivira, Kansas City, Westwood Hills, Mission Woods, Countryside, Roeland Park, Lackmans and Holliday. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 416 and 422. Interstate 35 in Missouri near mile marker 0. Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 214 and 235. Interstate 635 between mile markers 0 and 6. Interstate 435 between mile markers 0 and 9, and between mile markers 78 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
